name: Scraps (StrangerJam2020)
description:
Four strangers trying to put a game together and the only one who's done that before was the writer - that had to go well!
This is more of a showoff what we accomplished  in about 8 days. You can look at the art and listen to the  soundtrack.

There are no Enemies (only images)  and  no real mechanics(not implemented^^).

CONTROLS:

A,D - Move / Space - Jump

or use arrow keys
